author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Try to retrieve missing hits in the partial wafers of HGCal for DD4Hep description

#### PR validation:

Use the scripts in SimG4CMS/Calo/test/python

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx343 Try to retrieve missing hits in the partial wafers of HGCal for DD4Hep description
